short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Chrome bookmarks by adding #hashtags!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add #hashtags to your bookmarks titles and manage them simply!
Build and explore your tag cloud. 

Bookmarks views:
- by folder
- by date last added

Lightweight and easy to use.

You can still use your folders and bookmarks bar!
